segments.text: Oh , my god . I am so heavy now . I gain 10 kilos .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am going to the gym . Do you want to come with me ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I should go . I really need to lose some weight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then , I'll wait for you at the car park in 20 minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have your member card with you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nope , I do not have a membership yet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well I have a guest ticket . You can use it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is so nice of you . If I like the service and the training equipment , I think I well join the club .
segments.speaker: S1
